_sText:
***UPDATED***

Fortress of Zombitude release candidate 3

zm_foz_rc3

by Tim Bartlett



Straight up Zombie Mod map!  Flee into the Fortress and secure the massive front doors before the zombie horde gets inside.  


Humans -

- Use bunker emplacements to defend vulnerable Fortress infrastructure!

- Use missile launchers to defend the Fortress!

- Call in devastating mortar attacks!

- BLOW STUFF UP!


Zombies -

- Attack the Fortress systems, defeat lethal defenses, and breach the walls!

- Capture missile launchers and terrorize the humans!

- Watch out for the mines!

- BLOW STUFF UP!



INSTALLATION

Place the map and associated files (such as the bot nav mesh) in your cstrike/cstrike/maps folder
